title: Honour Level 1
body:
Ahh.. The happiest I've been in ages. Its been months since my suspension. Safe to say the new report system really works and that I was way excited to have reached level 1 honour again. :) 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Hello there,

May i ask how much time it took you to get back to honor level 1?
Nice work, keep being friendly in game :)

Apparently, threatening to feed, after someone bans your champ, is the reasoning behind my honour 0 still

I carried that game... basically 1v5 as AP Kog, and i got 4 honours for it, yet rito's reasoning is "you threatened to feed"

Meanwhile, it's still  been 4 months with regular honors....

Still 0... ty rito...

Valid reports or negative behaviour (even if they aren't enough to issue punishments) will prevent you from earning honour progress for that game, so even if you've earned honours from your team, if you've been demonstrating negative behaviour, you won't progress.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=reFJtmIJ,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-11-29T12:05:20.019+0000)
>
> Valid reports or negative behaviour (even if they aren't enough to issue punishments) will prevent you from earning honour progress for that game, so even if you've earned honours from your team, if you've been demonstrating negative behaviour, you won't progress.

I don't cheat, i don't int and i muteall, why would i get reported... other than by 4 mans who gang up on the one individual (which has happened on numerous occasions)

I don't know what your situation is, I can only tell you how it works really. Without seeing chat logs or replays I can't really comment more cause I don't know why exactly you wouldn't be earning honour.
